emails.subject: [Shoaib]: Exploring Software Intern Roles at Google
emails.content:
Hi Shoaib,

I hope this email finds you well. My name is Bhuvan Thirwani, and I am currently pursuing a Masters of Science in Computer Science at the University at Buffalo, State University of New York. I am reaching out to express my strong interest in a Software Intern opportunity at Google for Summer 2025.

As a Full Stack Developer with more than 2 years of professional experience, I have honed my skills in AWS, Python, Java, NodeJs, SQL, NoSQL, Docker, Kubernetes, React and Javascript. In my previous role, I successfully built a Manufacturing Application that automated processes within a manufacturing plant, showcasing my ability to deliver impactful solutions.

Key Achievements of My Background:

  • Research Contribution: Authored a paper in AI, demonstrating analytical and innovative thinking.
  • Coding: Strong foundation in Data Structures & Algorithms. 69th & 64th Rank worldwide in two coding competitions.

Google stands out to me because of its reputation for innovation and its commitment to pushing the boundaries of technology. I'm eager to contribute to your team's success by leveraging my diverse skill set and passion for problem-solving.

I have attached my resume for your review, and I'd love the opportunity to chat further about how my background aligns with the needs of your team. Please let me know if there's a convenient time for you to connect.

Thank you for your time and consideration, Shoaib. Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,

Bhuvan Thirwani
+1 716-228-4256
bhuvanth@buffalo.edu
LinkedIn Profile
